scripts.dump-households: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM households" > ./dumps/dump_households.json
scripts.dump-schedules: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM schedules" > ./dumps/dump_schedules.json
scripts.dump-completed_households: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM completed_households" > ./dumps/dump_completed_households.json
scripts.dump-wikis: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM wikis" > ./dumps/dump_wikis.json
scripts.dump-labels: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM labels" > ./dumps/dump_labels.json
scripts.dump-anniversaries: wrangler d1 execute casaparo --command "SELECT * FROM anniversaries" > ./dumps/dump_anniversaries.json
